reviews.review: F U C K ZZZ'S WHOLE FAMILY!!!!!!一天了，打一把到最后就掉线，有的时候刚开局没两分钟就掉线，掉线还有惩罚？？？？？？开始五分钟，现在十五分钟，半个小时，你咋不封我号啊？啊？从10段掉掉掉掉到15段，你知道我闪退了多少局吗？加速器换了三个还是这样，就是你游的问题！！！你游出了问题凭啥你锁玩家匹配时间？？？
it is very fun with friends if you have any

It a really good game with constant love from the developers. This means that they constantly listen to the community and also are at the ready to fix any bugs or errors. The DLC's are great and playing both survivor and killer is really fun!!!

これだけの時間をキラー専でプレイしてきましたが完全に愛想が尽きました。昔はよかったのにどうしてこうなった。
バランス調整があまりにも杜撰で初心者キラーの入る余地が一切ない。更に格差マッチが大幅アップ、出戻りしようにもこれではキラー側は萎える一方。キラー有利な状況でもサバイバー側が脱出できる余地があるため、全滅するまで出られないキラー側の時間だけがズルズル流れて、結局脱出されるなんてことも。戦況は優勢なのにストレスが掛かるだけの敗戦処理でもしている気分になります。勝っても負けても気分が悪くなるゲームなんてこれくらいなもんです。
今からこれをやるくらいなら別の対人ゲームやったほうがよっぽど有意義ですよ、金と時間をドブに捨てるようなものです。

Also ... am anfang hab ich surv gespielt ... war nicht so mein ding :( dann hab ich aber mal killer probiert und es hat richtig reingebockt, es fehlt nur noch ein bissi übung aber der grundstein ist gesetzt ..... Jetzt  muss nur noch die community ein bissl freundlicher werden und das game ist richtig geil .... also denkt immer daran es ist ein spiel und spiele sollen fun machen und nicht frusten ...... also wünsche ich euch gl hf und schonmal ein gg .... villt treffen wir uns ja am nächsten hacken ;) *messer ableck* xDD

Игра 10/10

При игре за выживших в тиму дают исключительно овощей которые любо ливают в начале катки, либо совершенно не умеют играть,  по итогу ты грубо говоря будешь постоянно играть 1 на 1 с маньяком, естественно без каких либо шансов на победу для тебя, как бы хорошо ты не играл.

А при игре за маньяков дают только сыграных выживших которые в 100% случаях играют по дискорду и совершенно не дадут тебе ничего сделать, в лучшем случае сделаешь -1 а остальные трое сбегут при этом постучав тебе фонариком по лбу.

Советую игру жестким мазохистам, остальным играть не советую.

1400小时，攻击判定跟砸板判定修改后，人类两圈等板必砸头，新的匹配机制不改以后再也不玩黎明杀机。
反正NTZZZ只会考虑单边人的游戏体验，不吃这坨屎。

If you like horror movies, you will probably like this game.

--- GAMEPLAY ---
Dead By Daylight is one game that I know I'll enjoy. The idea of the game is simple: you have 4 survivors who need to fix 5 generators to power the exit gate and escape. There's one killer who's sole purpose is to kill all the survivors by any means, but is usually done by putting the survivors on sacrificial hooks. As a survivor, you need to work as a team, otherwise no one is getting out alive (unless your a locker Meg). While working on generators, you need to be unhooking and healing your teammates, while occasionally taking a hit for them if they are being chased.

Survivors can do stuff like looping the killer to give others time to fix gens/heal each other. Looping is a fun thing to do in this game, but can take some time to learn how to do properly, since most maps have different spawns for windows and pallets (you vault the windows to gain distance and drop the pallets on the killer to either stun them or waste their time). Survivors have many different perks to choose from, but the main ones you'll see are "Self Care" "Adrenaline" "Decisive Strike" "Iron Will" "Quick and Quiet" "Dead Hard" "Balanced Landing" and a few more perks.

Each killer has a different ability that they can use to kill survivors. They can all be used in different ways depending on who you choose, your add-on's and the perks you choose. The Wraith can go invisible and move faster while cloaked. The Huntress can throw hatchets at a survivor at a distance. Ghost Face can use his Night Shroud to hide his terror radius to sneak up on survivors. There are too many killers to list on here.

--- Difficulty ---
7/10

This game can be very difficult when you first start if you haven't watched any videos relating to the game. You'll start out at Rank 20 (the lowest rank) and will slowly climb up in ranks the more games you play. The more you climb, the harder it'll get, as you'll start playing against more experienced killers/survivors who are used to the way people play and have tactics to catch people off guard.

--- Worth The Price ---
6/10

Very fun game can get most characters by earning Shards from leveling up. However, you have to pay for licensed characters.

--- SCORE ---
8/10

A fun game that you should try, even more fun when you play with friends.

---TLDR---

Pros: Fun game, especially with friends. Lots of different ways to play. No two games are the same. Feels good to kill survivors or escape killers.

Cons: If you play to well you get called a "camper" or a "tunneler". Have to pay for licensed characters. Steep learning curve when it comes to looping.
Love this game until I play it then immediately remember why I hate it

すぐバグる、バランス調整がいびつ、一部のプレイスタイルを否定するなどの要素に加えてプレイマナーの悪い人がそれなりにいます。これらが問題なければ楽しい霧の森生活を送ってください。ゲーム性はとてもいいものです。

Super Spiel, eine "Fangen"-Version für Erwachsene. Kann schön in Gruppe oder alleine gespielt werden, entweder als "Killer" oder als Überlebender. - Kann jedoch auch ein gewisses Level an Frust aufbauen, auch wieder auf beiden Seiten. Entweder man schafft nichts als Killer, weil die Gruppe so gut ist, oder der Killer nimmt den Spielspaß aus dem Spiel. 

Es ist also ein 4 vs. 1, jedoch spielen 5 Leute miteinander, das sollte glaube ich nicht vergessen werden (Bots gibts hier nicht). :)

after I started playing this game anger problems started to appear 10/10

I love this game. There are still a lot of things that need to be updated, but it's fun to play with friends! I think the game sometimes crash a bit often, and there can be a lot of toxic players on dead by daylight. However, there are a lot of good players who play the game for fun, and they aren't so toxic towards other players. Overall, I wish there were more fun outfits for the newer characters! Hopefully, it will come in time. I love the new events, and the the things they used for the rift. <3
